tool_description: Divides total recipe nutritional values by number of servings to provide per-serving nutritional information.

number_of_servings.description: Number of servings to divide by

error_messages: Invalid serving count: Number of servings must be a positive integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid nutritional totals: All nutritional values must be non-negative numbers.
Division by zero: Number of servings cannot be zero or negative.
usage: Input total nutritional values and number_of_servings. Returns nutritional information calculated per individual serving.

servings_calculated.description: Number of servings used for calculation
